chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: Type
K_eq_dec: forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y}

Goal:
forall (xs ys zs : list op) (k : K), NoDup (get_op_output_keys (xs ++ I k :: ys ++ O k :: zs)) -> In (O k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs) -> False

Premises:
NoDup : forall A : Type, list A -> Prop
get_op_output_keys = fun l : list op => filterMap (fun x : op => match x with | I _ => None | O k => Some k end) l : list op -> list K Arguments get_op_output_keys _%list_scope
Inductive op : Type := I : K -> op | O : K -> op
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
NoDup_get_op_output_keys_In_O : forall (xs ys : list op) (k : K), NoDup (get_op_output_keys (xs ++ O k :: ys)) -> In (O k) (xs ++ ys) -> False
op_equivalent_all_Is_O_middle : forall (xs ys : list op) (k : K), (forall k' : K, In (I k') xs -> k <> k') -> op_equivalent (xs ++ O k :: ys) (O k :: xs ++ ys)
op_equivalent_all_Is_I_middle : forall (xs ys : list op) (k : K), (forall x : op, In x xs -> exists k0 : K, x = I k0) -> op_equivalent (xs ++ I k :: ys) (I k :: xs ++ ys)
NoDup_app3_not_in_3 : forall (A : Type) (xs ys zs : list A) (b : A), NoDup (xs ++ ys ++ b :: zs) -> In b zs -> False
NoDup_app3_not_in_2 : forall (A : Type) (xs ys zs : list A) (b : A), NoDup (xs ++ ys ++ b :: zs) -> In b ys -> False
NoDup_app3_not_in_1 : forall (A : Type) (xs ys zs : list A) (b : A), NoDup (xs ++ ys ++ b :: zs) -> In b xs -> False
get_op_output_keys_complete : forall (xs : list op) (k : K), In (O k) xs -> In k (get_op_output_keys xs)
In_cons_2_3_neq : forall (A : Type) (a x y : A) (xs ys zs : list A), In a (xs ++ x :: ys ++ y :: zs) -> a <> x -> a <> y -> In a (xs ++ ys ++ zs)
In_cons_2_3 : forall (A : Type) (xs ys zs : list A) (x y a : A), In a (xs ++ ys ++ zs) -> In a (xs ++ x :: ys ++ y :: zs)
before_2_3_reduce : forall (A : Type) (xs ys zs : list A) (x y a b : A), before a b (xs ++ x :: ys ++ y :: zs) -> a <> x -> a <> y -> before a b (xs ++ ys ++ zs)
before_2_3_insert : forall (A : Type) (xs ys zs : list A) (x y a b : A), before a b (xs ++ ys ++ zs) -> b <> x -> b <> y -> before a b (xs ++ x :: ys ++ y :: zs)
subseq_2_3 : forall (A : Type) (xs ys zs : list A) (x y : A), subseq (xs ++ ys ++ zs) (xs ++ x :: ys ++ y :: zs)
IR_equiv_AAOF_II_neq : forall (xs ys : list op) (target : list IR) (k k' : K), k <> k' -> op_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target) (acknowledge_all_ops_func ys target) -> IR_equivalent (acknowledge_all_ops_func (I k :: I k' :: xs) target) (acknowledge_all_ops_func (I k' :: I k :: ys) target)
subseq_app_head : forall (A : Type) (xs ys zs : list A), subseq ys zs -> subseq (xs ++ ys) (xs ++ zs)
op_equivalent_all_Is_I : forall (l : list op) (k : K), (forall x : op, In x l -> exists k0 : K, x = I k0) -> op_equivalent (l ++ [I k]) (I k :: l)
op_equivalent_all_Is_O : forall (l : list op) (k : K), (forall k' : K, In (I k') l -> k <> k') -> op_equivalent (l ++ [O k]) (O k :: l)
get_op_input_keys_complete : forall (xs : list op) (k : K), In (I k) xs -> In k (get_op_input_keys xs)
IR_equiv_AAOF_I : forall (k : K) (xs ys : list op) (target : list IR), op_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target) (acknowledge_all_ops_func ys target) -> IR_equivalent (acknowledge_all_ops_func (I k :: xs) target) (acknowledge_all_ops_func (I k :: ys) target)
get_op_output_keys_sound : forall (k : K) (l : list op), In k (get_op_output_keys l) -> In (O k) l
in_rest_app_cons : forall (A : Type) (l xs ys : list A) (a b : A), l = xs ++ a :: ys -> In b l -> a <> b -> In b (xs ++ ys)
in_middle_reduce : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (xs : list A) (y : A) (zs : list A), In a (xs ++ y :: zs) -> a <> y -> In a (xs ++ zs)
in_middle_insert : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (xs : list A) (y : A) (zs : list A), In a (xs ++ zs) -> In a (xs ++ y :: zs)
acknowledged_op_defn : forall (k : K) (xs : list op), acknowledged_op k xs -> In (O k) xs
StepDup_dup : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net' = {| nwPackets := p :: xs ++ p :: ys; nwState := nwState net |} -> step_dup net net' [] where ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P]
app_cons_in_rest : forall (A : Type) (l xs : list A) (a b : A) (ys : list A), l = xs ++ a :: ys -> In b (xs ++ ys) -> In b l
StepFailure_dup : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net' = {| nwPackets := p :: xs ++ p :: ys; nwState := nwState net |} -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') [] where ?P0 : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- FailureParams ?P]
StepFailureDiskOp_dup : forall (net net' : do_network) (failed : list do_name) (p : do_packet) (xs ys : list do_packet), nwdoPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net' = {| nwdoPackets := p :: xs ++ p :: ys; nwdoState := nwdoState net; nwdoDisk := nwdoDisk net |} -> step_failure_disk_ops (failed, net) (failed, net') [] where ?P0 : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0] ?disk_op_failure_params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
filterMap_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> option B) (xs ys : list A), filterMap f (xs ++ ys) = filterMap f xs ++ filterMap f ys
dedup_partition : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs : list A) (p : A) (ys xs' ys' : list A), dedup A_eq_dec (xs ++ p :: ys) = xs' ++ p :: ys' -> remove A_eq_dec p (dedup A_eq_dec (xs ++ ys)) = xs' ++ ys'
before_head_op : forall (l : list op) (h : K) (ir : list IR), (forall k1 k2 : K, In (I k2) l -> before (O k1) (I k2) l -> before (IRO k1) (IRI k2) (IRI h :: ir)) -> forall x : op, In (I h) l -> before x (I h) l -> exists k : K, x = I k

```coq
intros xs ys zs k Hnodup Hin.
apply NoDup_app3_not_in_3 with (A := op) (xs := xs ++ I k :: ys) (b := O k) in Hnodup.
- apply Hnodup. apply In_cons_2_3_neq with (a := I k) (y := O k) in Hin.
  + assumption.
  + discriminate.
  + discriminate.
- apply in_middle_insert. assumption.
Qed.
```
